pageProduct.name: Voost Magnesium Forte Effervescent Tablets 10 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Voost Magnesium Forte 320mg Lemon flavour supports muscle health.

Uses - Magnesium Forte helps:
- Support muscle function and health.
- Convert carbohydrates and fats into energy.
- Support nervous system health.
- Support bone health (when dietary intake is inadequate).
- Support general health and wellbeing.
- Support cardiovascular system and heart health (when dietary intake is inadequate).
- Support energy production.

Product Claims: No added dairy, lactose or yeast.

Size: 10 Tablets

Flavour: Lemon

Warnings

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Vitamin and Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional. For adults only.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

These effervescent tablets contain a combination of magnesium carbonate and citric acid, which when prepared with water, forms highly bioavailable magnesium citrate.

Ingredients

Active ingredients per tablet:
Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate 1.32g
(Equivalent to Magnesium 320mg)
Citric Acid 5.39g
Colecalciferol 10 microgram
(Vitamin D3) 400 IU

Directions

How to use:
Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200mL of water, or as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C.
